El Paso. Dayton. 

Aurora, Parkland, Newtown, Charleston, Las Vegas, Gilroy, Sutherland Springs. 

So many communities upended, so many lives taken. 

When will enough be enough?

Our thoughts are with the victims, their loved ones, and all those affected by the horrific shooting in El Paso. 

Our communities will not be spared from such tragedies until we take action to end gun violence.

James Baldwin, who would've turned 95 today: "Here we are, at the center of the arc, trapped in the gaudiest, most valuable, and most improbable water wheel the world has ever seen. Everything now, we must assume, is in our hands; we have no right to assume otherwise." 

Exactly.
